scripts.start: tsc && time webpack --mode production && http-server --cors dist.browser
scripts.deploy-adex: npm run build && cp -rf ./dev-banners ./domains/adex/CNAME ./dist.browser && mkdir -p dist.browser/.well-known && cp dnt-policy.txt dist.browser/.well-known && gh-pages -d dist.browser
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cp -rf ./dev-banners ./domains/moonicorn/CNAME ./dist.browser && mkdir -p dist.browser/.well-known && cp dnt-policy.txt dist.browser/.well-known && gh-pages -d dist.browser -r git@github.com:AdExNetwork/adex-adview-manager-host.git
